description: The user asks PropScout AI to arrange a weekend property viewing in Santa Fe and receive a confirmation email. The assistant gathers needed details, schedules the viewing via calendar integration, sends a confirmation email, and reports back to the user.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. Use the available tools to retrieve data, schedule viewings, send emails, and generate reports to help investors and home‑buyers act on opportunities.
I’d like to schedule a weekend viewing for a property in Santa Fe and have you send me a confirmation email.

Sure! I’ll need a few details to set that up:
1. The full address of the property.
2. Your preferred weekend date and time (include time zone).
3. How long you’d like the viewing to last (in minutes).
4. The listing agent’s email address.
5. Your email address for the confirmation.

Please provide these and I’ll take care of the rest.

The address is 1234 Camino Real, Santa Fe, NM 87501. I’m free Saturday, December 14th at 10:00 AM Mountain Time and would like the viewing to be 90 minutes. The agent’s email is agent@example.com and my email is user@example.com.
Got it. I’ll schedule the viewing and then email you the confirmation.

arguments.subject: Viewing Confirmation: 1234 Camino Real, Santa Fe
arguments.body:
Hello,

Your property viewing has been scheduled as follows:
- **Address:** 1234 Camino Real, Santa Fe, NM 87501
- **Date & Time:** Saturday, December 14, 2025 at 10:00 AM MT
- **Duration:** 90 minutes
- **Listing Agent:** agent@example.com

An invitation has also been sent to the agent. Let us know if you need any changes.

Best regards,
PropScout AI

messages.content: Viewing scheduled successfully. Calendar event created for 1234 Camino Real on 2025-12-14 at 10:00 AM MT (90 minutes). Invitation sent to agent@example.com.
Email sent to user@example.com with subject "Viewing Confirmation: 1234 Camino Real, Santa Fe".

All set! Your weekend viewing at **1234 Camino Real, Santa Fe** is booked for Saturday, December 14, 2025 at 10:00 AM (MT) for 90 minutes. I’ve also emailed you the confirmation details. Let me know if anything else is needed.
